Eightieth session 
Third Committee 
Agenda item 67 
Promotion and protection of the rights of children 
 
 
 
 
 
Belarus and Russian Federation: amendment to revised draft resolution 
A/C.3/80/L.20/Rev.1 
 
 
 
 Rights of the child 
 
 
1. 
In the fourteenth preambular paragraph, replace “which notes that young 
children are holders of all rights enshrined in the Convention and that early childhood 
is a critical period for the realization of these rights” with “and taking note of the 
statement of the Committee on the Rights of the Child on article 5 of the Convention 
(2023)”. 
2. 
Delete the fifteenth preambular paragraph.
